byline.contributor: John Surico contributed reporting, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.

abstract: Teenager NeShawn  Plummer is fatally shot in Far Rockaway, Queens, three blocks from where his older brother Shawn was killed three years prior; killings, neither of which has been solved, underscore danger of rough neighborhood that has only become rougher since being ravaged by Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: NeShawn Plummer, 16, was shot in Far Rockaway, three blocks from where his brother Shawn, 17, was killed in 2012.

headline.main: Tears and Anger in Queens After Mother Loses Another Son to Violence
headline.print_headline: Tears and Anger in Queens After Mother Loses Another Son to Violence

snippet: NeShawn Plummer, 16, was shot in Far Rockaway, three blocks from where his brother Shawn, 17, was killed in 2012.
